word:
Do you want to know just what to do? Say, "I rejoice that I have found out how defective I am, and I am going to overcome sin and be a victor; for He says, " To him that overcometh will I grant to sit with me in my throne, even as I also overcame, and am set down with my Father in his throne" (Revelation


                                    -247- 

3:21). Will you overcome as Christ overcame? Shall we have the victory? Jesus Christ is our Saviour.
